updateStatusBar() - Method in class textr.TextView
Updates status bar to correctly display: - filename - amount of lines - amount of characters - is a view active or not - is a view dirty or not (there are changes made to the file which are not yet saved to the file) with an "*" behind the filename - row and column coordinates of cursor
